patterns: where is dhvsu porac campus located
where is dabsu porac campus located
responses: The DHVSU Porac Campus is located in Porac, Pampanga, and is 15.06 kilometers away, west of the main campus of DHVSU in Bacolor, Pampanga.
Don Honorio Ventura State University is a PUBLIC university.

patterns: What are the requirements of Transferees to enroll in DHVSU Porac Campus
What are the requirements of Transferees to enroll in dabsu Porac Campus
responses: Requirements for transferees to enroll in DHVSU Porac Campus:| 1. Duly accomplished Application Form Photocopy of Grades Copy of Honorable Dismissal Certificate of Good Moral| 2. 2 pcs. passport size picture with name tag (white background)

patterns: What are the requirements of Freshmen to enroll in DHVSU Porac Campus
What are the requirements of Freshmen to enroll in dabsu Porac Campus
responses: Requirements for freshmen to enroll in DHVSU Porac Campus:| 1. Duly accomplished Application Form Photocopy of Form138| 2. 2 pcs. passport size picture with name tag (white background) 3. PSA Birth Certificate

patterns: who is the academic chairperson at dhvsu porac campus
who is the academic chairperson at dabsu porac campus
who is the academic chairperson of porac campus
responses: Aileen L. Koh, M.A.Ed. is the Academic Chairperson of DHVSU Porac Campus

patterns: who is the director at dhvsu porac campus
who is the director at dabsu porac campus
who is the director of porac campus
responses: DENNIS V. DIZON, M.A.Ed. is the Campus Director of DHVSU Porac Campus

DHVSU MISSION:| DHVSU commits itself to provide an environment conducive to continuous creation of knowledge and technology towards the transformation of students into globally competitive professionals through the synergy of appropriate teaching, research, service and productivity functions.

DHVSU VISION:| A lead university in producing quality individuals with competent capacities to generate knowledge and technology and enhance professional practices for sustainable national and global competitiveness through continuous innovation.

patterns: How much is the tuition fee per semester?
responses: Under the Law, students in accredited State and Local universities/colleges will not pay any tuition fees or misc fee.

patterns: What are the available courses in DHVSU Porac Campus
responses: AVAILABLE COURSES IN DHVSU PORAC CAMPUS:| Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Education.| Bachelor of Science in Business Administration Major in Marketing.| Bachelor of Science in Information Technology.| Bachelor of Science in Social Work

patterns: What is the schedule of BSSW-2A

responses: Schedule of Bachelor of Science in Social Work - 2A:| In Monday: 7:30 A.M. - 3:30 P.M. subjects are SOSLIT, A5, E1, and GEC 2.| In Tuesday: 7:30 A.M. - 3:30 P.M. subjects are B6, A4, and GEC 1.| In Wednesday: 7:30 A.M. - 1:30 P.M. subjects are SOSLIT, A5, and GEC 2.| In Thursday: 1:00 P.M. - 2:30 P.M. subjects are GEC 1, and P.E. 3.| In Friday there are no subjects.

patterns: What is the schedule of BSIT-1C
What is the schedule of Information Technology 1C
What is the schedule of B.S. Infotech 1C
responses: Schedule of Bachelor of Information Technology - 1C:| In Monday: 9:00 A.M. - 5:30 P.M. subjects are MATH, CSS, and CC.| In Tuesday: 7:30 A.M. - 12:00 P.M., subjects are IT, SOC SCI, and FILIPINO.| In Wednesday: 7:30 A.M. - 1:30 P.M. subjects are IT, FILIPINO, and CC.| In Thursday: 7:30 A.M. - 3:30 P.M. subjects are CC (A), MATH, HUM, and CC (B).| In Friday: 7:30 A.M. - 3:00 P.M. subjects are HUM, FILIPINO, SOC SCI, P.E.
